qas.question: What ailment did Harper Lee's mother suffer from?
What profession did Harper Lee's father hold?
Lee modeled the character Atticus after what laywer?

context: Lee had lost her mother, who suffered from <a0_0>mental illness<a0_0/>, six years before she met Hohoff at Lippincott’s offices. <a2_0>Her father<a2_0/>, a <a1_0>lawyer<a1_0/> on whom Atticus was modeled, would die two years after the publication of To Kill a Mockingbird.
